[[Image:The Tolkien Calendar 1992.jpg: '''The Tolkien Calendar 1992''' was published by Seckja Tolkienowska, Poland (Polish Tolkien Society) and was edited by Andrzej Kowalski. The calendar features black and white illustrations by [[Ma≈Çgorzata Pudlik]] and [[Aleksandra Kosciuszuk]]. Two versions were created, an A3 size and an unbound A4 size.
